title: Signify to introduce new products and innovations at CIIE - SHINE News
summary: At the China International Import Expo, Signify exhibited its newest innovations and products, strengthening its commitment to sustainable development in China. The company emphasized its range of high-tech, low-carbon solutions, including advanced plant lighting systems and energy-efficient LED products. Through collaboration with local partners, Signify aims to implement cutting-edge technologies, stimulate innovation, and support China's transition to a greener, more sustainable future.
green_innovation: TRUE, Signify's focus on developing sustainable solutions that reduce environmental impact and promote carbon emission reduction efforts aligns with China's push for carbon neutrality and environmental protection.
business_innovation: TRUE, Signify is introducing innovative products, such as the Philips Hue Perifo smart track lighting, and implementing circular manufacturing methods in its production.
green_product: TRUE, Signify's products prioritize energy efficiency, resource conservation, and sustainable materials, such as the low-carbon and energy-saving plant lighting solutions.
green_process: TRUE, Signify's commitment to sustainability extends to its manufacturing processes, incorporating 3D printing and the utilization of recycled plastic and green electricity, thereby reducing environmental impact.
product_or_process: Advanced plant lighting systems, energy-efficient LED products, Philips Hue Perifo smart track lighting
likely_naics_codes: ['335121 - Industrial Lighting Fixture Manufacturing', '335129 - Other Lighting Equipment Manufacturing', '335999 - All Other Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing', '325411 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing']
greenwashing: FALSE, Signify's products and processes are genuinely sustainable, demonstrating a commitment to environmental responsibility and circularity.
